description:
Dear all China fans,

Let's have our first kick-off meetup in the town center next Monday!

Are you curious about:
- the largest nation in the world? 
- the fastest economy growing nation of the BRICS?
- the only nation with the longest and un-interrupted civilized history?
- the most difficult language yet with the easiest grammar?
- the nation held the 2008 Beijing Olympics?

And those who wanna make new friends from the other side of the globe?
- and many more curiosities?

Come to join our group!

We will speak English by default but some interesting intro about the Chinese language!:)
how_to_find_us: Just call me once you have arrived. We will probably sit at 1st floor.
name: The kickoff meetup coffee in town center

description: Dear all Fans of China: as talked during our 1st meetup, shall we get together before my departure for China(Sun,1-Dec) for a typical Chinese dinner at town center? Let's talk about the culture, the language and the business with China.

venue.name: Meiweilou Chinese Restaurant (Just at the opposite corner of Drug Opera)

name: Our Chinese Dinner Meetup - Bru Town Center
